sql.isEqual: a.appr_users_id as appr_id, IF(appr_users_id != '' AND appr_users_id IS NOT NULL, (SELECT appr_info.users_nm FROM c_user_mgt appr_info WHERE rst_seq = 0 AND a.appr_users_id = appr_info.users_id), '') as appr_nm, a.app_type as appr_type, a.app_time as appr_time
sql.isNotEqual: '' as appr_id, '' as appr_nm, '' as appr_type, null as appr_time

sql.isEqual:
( SELECT IFNULL(real_appr_id,appr_id) AS appr_users_id, np_cd, data_seq, app_type, app_time FROM approval appr WHERE appr.app_ord = 1 ) a ON ( a.data_seq = io_data.data_seq
AND a.np_cd = io_data.networkPosition
AND a.np_cd = #networkPosition#
)

isEqual.isEqual: (SELECT func_dept_nm(manage_value) as dept_nm FROM admin_management WHERE type = 0 AND cud_cd != 'D' AND admin_id = #admin_id#) a ON (a.dept_nm = io_data.dept_nm_path )
(SELECT func_dept_nm(manage_value) as dept_nm FROM admin_management WHERE type = 0 AND cud_cd != 'D' AND admin_id = #admin_id#) a ON (a.dept_nm = i_o_data.dept_nm_path )

isEqual.isNotEmpty: users_id in ( ( SELECT u.users_id FROM c_user_mgt u, c_dept_mgt d WHERE d.rst_seq = 0 AND d.cud_cd != 'D' AND u.dept_seq = d.dept_seq AND u.rst_seq = 0 AND u.users_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchValue#,'%') ) )

io_data.users_id in ( ( SELECT u.users_id FROM c_user_mgt u, c_dept_mgt d WHERE d.rst_seq = 0 AND d.cud_cd != 'D' AND u.dept_seq = d.dept_seq AND u.rst_seq = 0 AND u.users_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchValue#,'%') ) )

i_o_data.users_id in ( ( SELECT u.users_id FROM c_user_mgt u, c_dept_mgt d WHERE d.rst_seq = 0 AND d.cud_cd != 'D' AND u.dept_seq = d.dept_seq AND u.rst_seq = 0 AND u.users_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchValue#,'%') ) )

sql.isEqual: EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM vw_manage_user_list_d a, (SELECT @users_id:=#admin_id#) b WHERE a.users_id = u.users_id)

isEqual.isEqual: EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM vw_manage_user_list_d a, (SELECT @users_id:=#admin_id#) b WHERE a.users_id = user.users_id)

sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM

SELECT * FROM
WHERE tx_del_yn = 'N' AND rx_del_yn = 'N' AND users_id = #users_id# AND title = #title# AND crt_time = #crt_time#

SELECT max(data_seq) FROM
WHERE users_id = #users_id#

SELECT file_data.*, u.users_nm as users_nm FROM as file_data INNER JOIN (SELECT users_id as id, users_nm, dept_seq FROM c_user_mgt WHERE RST_SEQ = 0 AND cud_cd != 'D') u ON ( u.id = file_data.users_id ) INNER JOIN (SELECT dept_seq FROM c_dept_mgt WHERE RST_SEQ = 0 AND cud_cd != 'D') m ON ( m.dept_seq = u.dept_seq ) WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY crt_time DESC limit $offSet$, $pageListSize$

/* selectDataTotalList */ SELECT io_data.*, u.users_nm as users_nm
FROM ( (SELECT 'I' as networkPosition, i.*, SUM(i_ath.file_size) as file_total_size, i_ath.file_nm as file_nm, COUNT(*) as file_total_count, MAX(i_ath.user_download_time) as max_download_time FROM in_data as i, in_ath_file as i_ath WHERE 1=1 AND i.data_seq = i_ath.data_seq
GROUP BY data_seq ) UNION ALL ( SELECT 'O' as networkPosition, o.*, SUM(o_ath.file_size) as file_total_size, o_ath.file_nm as file_nm, COUNT(*) as file_total_count, MAX(o_ath.user_download_time) as max_download_time FROM out_data as o, out_ath_file as o_ath WHERE 1=1 AND o.data_seq = o_ath.data_seq
GROUP BY data_seq ) ) as io_data INNER JOIN (SELECT users_id AS id, users_nm, dept_seq FROM c_user_mgt user WHERE rst_seq = 0 AND cud_cd != 'D'
) u ON (u.id = io_data.users_id) INNER JOIN (SELECT dept_seq , dept_nm FROM c_dept_mgt WHERE rst_seq = 0 AND cud_cd != 'D') m ON ( m.dept_seq = u.dept_seq )
WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY io_data.crt_time DESC limit #offSet#, $pageListSize$

/* Data.selectVcFileTotalExcelList */ SELECT * FROM ( ( SELECT a.*, 'I' as np_cd FROM in_ath_file a WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY crt_time DESC ) UNION ALL ( SELECT a.*, 'O' as np_cd FROM out_ath_file a WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY crt_time DESC ) ) b, c_user_mgt u, c_dept_mgt d WHERE b.crtr_id = u.users_id AND u.rst_seq = 0 and d.rst_seq = 0 and u.dept_seq = d.dept_seq
b.$searchField$ LIKE CONCAT('%',#filterSearchValue#,'%')
u.$searchField$ LIKE CONCAT('%',#filterSearchValue#,'%')
ORDER BY b.crt_time DESC

SELECT a.*, u.users_nm FROM
in_ath_file a, c_user_mgt u
out_ath_file a, c_user_mgt u
WHERE a.crtr_id = u.users_id and u.rst_seq = 0 and u.rst_seq = 0
b.$searchField$ = #filterSearchValue#
u.$searchField$ = #filterSearchValue#
ORDER BY crt_time DESC limit $offSet$, $pageListSize$

SELECT COUNT(data_seq) FROM
in_ath_file a, c_user_mgt u
out_ath_file a, c_user_mgt u
WHERE a.crtr_id = u.users_id and u.rst_seq = 0
b.$searchField$ = #filterSearchValue#
u.$searchField$ = #filterSearchValue#

/* selectDlpFileTotalList */ SELECT b.*, u.users_nm, d.dept_seq , d.dept_nm FROM ( ( SELECT a.*, 'I' as np_cd FROM in_ath_file a WHERE 1=1 AND dlp_status = #dlp_status#
ORDER BY crt_time DESC ) UNION ALL ( SELECT a.*, 'O' as np_cd FROM out_ath_file a WHERE 1=1 AND dlp_status = #dlp_status#
ORDER BY crt_time DESC ) ) b, c_user_mgt u, c_dept_mgt d WHERE b.crtr_id = u.users_id AND u.rst_seq = 0 and d.rst_seq = 0 and u.dept_seq = d.dept_seq
ORDER BY b.crt_time DESC limit $offSet$, $pageListSize$

/* selectAptFileTotalList */ SELECT b.*, u.users_nm, d.dept_seq , d.dept_nm FROM ( ( SELECT a.*, 'I' as np_cd FROM in_ath_file a WHERE 1=1 AND apt_status = #apt_status#
ORDER BY crt_time DESC ) UNION ALL ( SELECT a.*, 'O' as np_cd FROM out_ath_file a WHERE 1=1 AND apt_status = #apt_status#
ORDER BY crt_time DESC ) ) b, c_user_mgt u, c_dept_mgt d WHERE b.crtr_id = u.users_id AND u.rst_seq = 0 and d.rst_seq = 0 and u.dept_seq = d.dept_seq
ORDER BY b.crt_time DESC limit $offSet$, $pageListSize$

/* selectDlpFileTotalExcelList */ SELECT b.*, u.users_nm, d.dept_seq , d.dept_nm FROM ( ( SELECT a.*, 'I' as np_cd FROM in_ath_file a WHERE 1=1 AND dlp_status = #dlp_status#
ORDER BY crt_time DESC ) UNION ALL ( SELECT a.*, 'O' as np_cd FROM out_ath_file a WHERE 1=1 AND dlp_status = #dlp_status#
ORDER BY crt_time DESC ) ) b, c_user_mgt u, c_dept_mgt d WHERE b.crtr_id = u.users_id AND u.rst_seq = 0 and d.rst_seq = 0 and u.dept_seq = d.dept_seq
ORDER BY b.crt_time DESC

/* selectAptFileTotalExcelList */ SELECT b.*, u.users_nm, d.dept_seq , d.dept_nm FROM ( ( SELECT a.*, 'I' as np_cd FROM in_ath_file a WHERE 1=1 AND apt_status = #apt_status#
ORDER BY crt_time DESC ) UNION ALL ( SELECT a.*, 'O' as np_cd FROM out_ath_file a WHERE 1=1 AND apt_status = #apt_status#
ORDER BY crt_time DESC ) ) b, c_user_mgt u, c_dept_mgt d WHERE b.crtr_id = u.users_id AND u.rst_seq = 0 and d.rst_seq = 0 and u.dept_seq = d.dept_seq
ORDER BY b.crt_time DESC
SELECT MAX(data_seq + 1) AS data_seq FROM

SELECT * FROM
WHERE 1=1
in_del_yn = #in_del_yn#
out_del_yn = #out_del_yn#
AND data_seq = #data_seq# AND ath_ord = #ath_ord#

/* Data.selectAttachFileList */ SELECT * FROM
WHERE 1=1
in_del_yn = #in_del_yn#
out_del_yn = #out_del_yn#
data_seq = #data_seq#
ath_ord = #ath_ord#
#dataSeqList[]#
#attachOrderList[]#
apt_status = 0
ORDER BY ath_ord ASC

SELECT * FROM in_ath_file WHERE 1=1
in_del_yn = #in_del_yn#
out_del_yn = #out_del_yn#
data_seq = #data_seq#
ath_ord = #ath_ord#
#dataSeqList[]#
#attachOrderList[]#
UNION ALL SELECT * FROM out_ath_file WHERE 1=1
in_del_yn = #in_del_yn#
out_del_yn = #out_del_yn#
data_seq = #data_seq#
ath_ord = #ath_ord#
#dataSeqList[]#
#attachOrderList[]#
ORDER BY ath_ord ASC

SELECT DISTINCT(data_seq) FROM
file_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#file_nm#,'%')

SELECT DISTINCT(data_seq) FROM in_ath_file
file_nm = #file_nm#
UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT(data_seq) FROM out_ath_file
file_nm = #file_nm#
select now() from dual
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO
( users_id, title, crt_time, compress_yn
comment
status
enc_yn
enc_key
send_app_type
connect_ip
dept_nm_past, dept_nm_path
) VALUES ( #users_id#, #title#, #crt_time#, #compress_yn#
#comment#
#status#
#enc_yn#
#enc_key#
#send_app_type#
#connect_ip#
#dept_nm#, func_dept_nm(#dept_seq#)
)
SELECT MAX(data_seq) from

INSERT INTO
( data_seq, ath_ord, file_nm, file_ext, file_size, file_path, crtr_id, crt_time, vc_status
virus_name
users_id
connect_ip
) VALUES ( #data_seq#, #ath_ord#, #file_nm#, #file_ext#, #file_size#, #file_path#, #crtr_id#, #crt_time#, #vc_status#
#virus_name#
#users_id#
#connect_ip#
)

UPDATE
rx_yn = #rx_yn#
rx_time = now()
status = #status#
tx_del_yn = #tx_del_yn#
rx_del_yn = #rx_del_yn#
zip_yn = #zip_yn#
read_yn = #read_yn#
logging_path = #logging_path#
loggin_yn = #loggin_yn#
tx_del_time = #tx_del_time#
rx_del_time = #rx_del_time#
enc_yn = #enc_yn#
enc_key = #enc_key#
dlp_yn = #dlp_yn#
statics_time = now()
statics_time = now()
data_seq = #data_seq#
#dataSeqList[]#

UPDATE
SET del_yn = "Y", del_time = NOW(), mod_time = NOW() WHERE data_seq = #data_seq# AND ath_ord = #ath_ord#

UPDATE
vc_status = #vc_status#
send_result = #send_result#
file_path = #file_path#
in_del_yn = #in_del_yn#
out_del_yn = #out_del_yn#
in_del_time = #in_del_time#
out_del_time = #out_del_time#
mod_time = NOW()
modr_id = #modr_id#
virus_name = #virus_name#
file_size = #file_size#
file_block_detail_msg = #file_block_detail_msg#
block_step = #block_step#
dlp_status = #dlp_status#
apt_status = #apt_status#
apt_send_yn = #apt_send_yn#
dlp_detail_msg = #dlp_detail_msg#
encrypt_yn = #encrypt_yn#
user_download_time = #user_download_time#
app_download_time = #app_download_time#
statics_time = now()
data_seq = #data_seq#
ath_ord = #ath_ord#

UPDATE
SET del_yn = "Y", del_time = NOW(), mod_time = NOW()
#dataSeqList[]#
sqlMap.select:
/* selectCheckDataCnt */ SELECT count(*) FROM approval
out_data
WHERE 1=1 AND data_seq = #data_seq#
AND (users_id = #users_id# or appr_id = #users_id#)
AND users_id = #users_id#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE
SET download_cnt = download_cnt+1 WHERE data_seq = #data_seq#
#attachOrderList[]#
AND ath_ord = #ath_ord#

UPDATE
SET download_cnt = download_cnt-1 WHERE data_seq = #data_seq#
#attachOrderList[]#
AND ath_ord = #ath_ord#
sqlMap.select: /* selectUserUsedRepositorySize */ SELECT ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(file_size), 0)/1024/1024 /* MB */ FROM d, a WHERE d.data_seq = a.data_seq AND d.users_id = #users_id# AND a.in_del_yn = 'N' AND d.tx_del_yn = 'N' ) + ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(file_size), 0)/1024/1024 /* MB */ FROM d, a WHERE d.data_seq = a.data_seq AND d.users_id = #users_id# AND a.in_del_yn = 'N' AND d.rx_del_yn = 'N' AND d.rx_yn = 'Y' ) AS used FROM dual
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE SET download_cnt=0 WHERE data_seq=#data_seq#
ath_ord=#ath_ord#
/* updateApprovalWait */ UPDATE SET status = #status# WHERE data_seq = #data_seq#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT main.*, u.users_nm, d.dept_nm FROM ( SELECT file_data.data_seq, file_data.status, file_data.send_app_type, file_data.title, file_data.crt_time, file_data.rx_time, file_data.comment, file_data.users_id, file_data.enc_key, file_data.compress_yn, file_data.dlp_yn FROM as file_data WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY $sortBy$ $descending$
limit $offSet$, $pageListSize$
) main LEFT OUTER JOIN c_user_mgt u ON ( u.users_id = main.users_id and u.use_yn = 'Y' and u.rst_seq = 0 and u.cud_cd != 'D' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN c_dept_mgt d ON ( u.dept_seq = d.dept_seq and d.use_yn = 'Y' and d.rst_seq = 0 and d.cud_cd != 'D' )

SELECT data_seq, ath_ord, vc_status, send_result, file_size, file_nm, in_del_yn, out_del_yn, file_block_detail_msg, block_step, download_cnt, file_block_detail_msg as block_msg, dlp_status, apt_status, apt_send_yn FROM
WHERE 1=1
data_seq = #data_seq#
sqlMap.insert: /* data.insertReceiveData */ INSERT INTO receive_data(data_seq, io_cd, users_id, downloadable, result_code, result_msg, mod_id) VALUES ( #data_seq#, #io_cd#, #users_id#, 'Y', #result_code#, #result_msg#, #mod_id# )
sqlMap.delete:
/* data.deleteReceiveDataList */ DELETE FROM receive_data WHERE io_cd = #io_cd#
#dataSeqList[]#
sqlMap.select:
/* Data.selectDataReceive */ SELECT r.data_seq, r.users_id, d.title, d.enc_yn, d.enc_key, d.crt_time, r.io_cd FROM receive_data r, d WHERE 1=1 AND r.data_seq = d.data_seq AND r.result_code < 0 AND d.rx_del_yn = 'N' AND d.rx_yn = 'Y' AND d.status = 'SS'
r.downloadable = #downloadable#
r.users_id = #users_id#
r.io_cd = #networkPosition#
r.data_seq = #data_seq#
ORDER BY r.crt_time ASC
LIMIT #limit#
sqlMap.update: /* data.updateReceiveData */ UPDATE receive_data SET result_code = #result_code# , result_msg = #result_msg# , mod_id = #mod_id# WHERE data_seq = #data_seq# AND io_cd = #io_cd#
sqlMap.select:
/* data.selectFindDataList */ SELECT * FROM
WHERE 1=1
#dataSeqList[]#
ORDER BY data_seq ASC

/* data.selectFindAttachFileList */ SELECT * FROM
WHERE 1=1
in_del_yn = #in_del_yn#
out_del_yn = #out_del_yn#
download_cnt < #download_cnt#
#dataSeqList[]#
#vcStatusList[]#
send_result != #send_result#
ORDER BY data_seq ASC

/* data.getAllDownloadCnt */ SELECT count(*) FROM
WHERE data_seq = #data_seq# AND
app_download_time is null
user_download_time is null
#vcStatusList[]#

/* selectDeleteDataList */ SELECT file_data.* FROM as file_data WHERE 1=1
#dataSeqList[]#
